column1: Local Foods////I came here for lunch with my friend who introduced Local Foods to me.  It has such a great concept:  Freshly made foods with local ingredients!  The atmosphere is very "green" feeling
column2: with big windows and sun light shining through.  Benched tables or booths to sit at and the smell of freshness floating around at your nose.  They have a parking lot in the front that share with the neighboring restaurants.  I didn't experience any parking problems since we came a little after the lunch rush (1:30PM).
